name: Cafon Street
summary:
After a long wait the official game of "Cafon Street" is now available for your iPhone, iPad, iPod!
In Messina the uncle Lillo in his Apecar is scattering pieces everywhere!
Harry up! help Mimmo and Stellario to collect all the lost items! but look at all the obstacles that you will find all the road long; fortunately your souped up motor will allow you to make jumps and double jumps to avoid piles of garbage and even Santino riding his green moto!
